00004     \brief Core Driver: Provides scratchpad requirements for Core PCI driver.

00007 #ifndef __CVM_DRV_RESOURCES_CONFIG__
00008 #define __CVM_DRV_RESOURCES_CONFIG__
00009                                                                                                                                                              
00010 /* Content below this point is only used by the cvmx-config tool, and is
00011 ** not used by any C files as CAVIUM_COMPONENT_REQUIREMENT is never
00012 defined.
00013 */
00014 #ifdef CAVIUM_COMPONENT_REQUIREMENT
00015     /* global resource requirement */
00016     cvmxconfig
00017     {
00018         scratch CVM_DRV_SCR_WQE_BUF_PTR
00019             size = 8
00020             iobdma = true
00021             permanent = true
00022             description = "Scratch pad location for WQE buffer pointer";
